metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0030 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s nouveau driver in how a user triggers a memory overflow that causes the nvkm_vma_tail function to fail. This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.

notes.Note: sbeattie> the kernel maintainer has reported that this is a false positive vulnerability report.

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
